In England, in the seven days to 16 June, there were 77,550 new confirmed cases (137.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 09 June, there were 58,775 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 32% (18,775 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 21 June is 18,961,236 (33,530 cases per 100,000 population).
